title: Affordable Apartments for Rent in Las Vegas ,NV
posting_body: ['See Yourself Here', 'Picture yourself in a gorgeous garden apartment at 5400 Vistas, an upscale community.', 'Offering one, two and three bedroom layouts.', 'From appealing features such as hardwood flooring to modern conveniences such as in-home dishwashers and washer and dryer sets, you’ll have everything you need to live well.', 'Enjoy fun in the sun at our sparkling renovated pool.', 'Additionally, you can sit by the outdoor fireplace, work up a sweat in the fitness center or cook on the barbecue grills.', 'Conveniently located near RTC transit and I-95, you’ll enjoy easy access to the entire Las Vegas Valley.', 'Endless enjoyment awaits you at 5400 Vistas.', 'Come see your next apt.', 'today.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 700 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- - Carpeted bedroom', '- - Private patio/balcony', '- - Walk-in closet in bedroom', 'Community Amenities', '- Outdoor Fireplace', '- Outdoor Swimming Pool', '- On-Site Fitness Center', '- Dog Park', '- Close to Park', '- Convenient Locations', '- On-Site Management', '- Gated Community', '- Carport Parking', '- BBQ Grills', '- Playground', '- Pet Friendly', 'Pet Policy', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartments home.', 'There is a $300 non-refundable pet fee for 1 pet, and a $500 non-refundable pet fee for 2 pets.', 'Pet rent is $25 per pet, per month.', 'The weight limit is 75 lbs per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please contact our leasing office for more information about our pet policy.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Three times the base rent amount.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', '5400 Vistas', '5400 Mountain Vista Street, Las Vegas, NV, 89120', 'RNdRgYl9']
